scripts.generate-types: NODE_ENV=buildTypes rm -f db-types.sqlite && npm run db-migrate && node dist/tools/generate-types.js && rm -f db-types.sqlite
scripts.db-migrate: npm run compile && npx knex migrate:latest
scripts.postinstall: npm run compile && npm run db-migrate-latest && npm run generate-types
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing rm -f db-test.sqlite && npm run compile && npx knex migrate:latest && npx jasmine --config=tests/support/jasmine.json
